column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ Daun Penh police arrested 5 drug traffickers and seized 519 small packages and 5 big packets of narcotics
column4: along with a fish game table.------The incident happened at around 1 am on June 10
column9: a 16 year old and a man aged 31 were arrested.------The five confesses to the authorities that the drugs were theirs.------Police are now submitting a case file for the court.
